overview:
An Entrepreneur with passion, ambition, and inspiration to help people stay on the right path to eternity with God and His creation.

-Studied Landscape Horticulture Management and Business at the University of Louisiana at Lafayette.

-Educated and continues studies in: Geo-political economics, theology, human sustainability, visual and theatrical arts, health, landscape horticulture management, marketing, business management, film directing, photography, writing, web-design, Photoshop CS5.1+, internet/social-media marketing, self-sustainable practices, real-estate, store front developments, economical cars, “green living”, greenhouse management and sales, Music history, French, and nano-technology.

-Christian who Co-founded a non-denominational ministry online called EndTimesRevelation.org with Whitney Segura.

-Quotes: (1)”Judge nor Condemn, but Forgive in its place to stay true to His heart”- Taylor Judice

(2)”Love is like the air you breathe, for if there was no love, you wouldn’t exist.”- Taylor Judice

(3)”Beautiful plants in a greenhouse are often root pruned because having a healthy root will develop the plant properly. Like plants, our Spirits must be pruned daily to develop a healthy relationship with God and His creation.”- Taylor Judice

(4)”Life is a test, a blink of an eye relative to time, and we are here visiting to love one another radiating through God’s love for us.”- Taylor Judice

(5)”Faith will bring your valleys to mountain-tops. Very often, the lowest valleys create the greatest mountain-tops.”- Taylor Judice
